motivational_quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
motivational_quotes.author: Christian D. Larson
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.”
- Christian D. Larson

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational_quotes.author: Winston Churchill
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.”
- Winston Churchill

motivational_quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational_quotes.author: Steve Jobs
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The only way to do great work is to love what you do.”
- Steve Jobs

motivational_quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational_quotes.author: Sam Levenson
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.”
- Sam Levenson

motivational_quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
motivational_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The future depends on what you do today.”
- Mahatma Gandhi

motivational_quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivational_quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.”
- C.S. Lewis

motivational_quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
motivational_quotes.author: Unknown
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.”
- Unknown

motivational_quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Believe you can and you're halfway there.”
- Theodore Roosevelt

motivational_quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
motivational_quotes.author: Mark Twain
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The secret of getting ahead is getting started.”
- Mark Twain

motivational_quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivational_quotes.author: Confucius
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.”
- Confucius

motivational_quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
motivational_quotes.author: George Washington
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.”
- George Washington

motivational_quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
motivational_quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.”
- Roy T. Bennett

motivational_quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
motivational_quotes.author: Colin R. Davis
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.”
- Colin R. Davis

motivational_quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
motivational_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.”
- Henry David Thoreau

motivational_quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.”
- Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational_quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
motivational_quotes.author: Frank Sinatra
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The best revenge is massive success.”
- Frank Sinatra

motivational_quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
motivational_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.”
- Thomas Jefferson

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
motivational_quotes.author: Bo Bennett
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success is not in what you have, but who you are.”
- Bo Bennett

motivational_quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.”
- Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational_quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
motivational_quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh (Alice in Wonderland)
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.”
- Charles Kingsleigh (Alice in Wonderland)

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
motivational_quotes.author: Winston Churchill
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.”
- Winston Churchill

motivational_quotes.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
motivational_quotes.author: Mark Caine
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.”
- Mark Caine

motivational_quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
motivational_quotes.author: Unknown
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.”
- Unknown

motivational_quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
motivational_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.”
- John D. Rockefeller

motivational_quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
motivational_quotes.author: Bruce Lee
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.”
- Bruce Lee

motivational_quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
motivational_quotes.author: Lao Tzu
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.”
- Lao Tzu

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
motivational_quotes.author: Unknown
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.”
- Unknown

motivational_quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
motivational_quotes.author: Chinese Proverb
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.”
- Chinese Proverb

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not in the possession of treasures, but in the joy of achievement.
motivational_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
motivational_quotes.html_quote:
“Success is not in the possession of treasures, but in the joy of achievement.”
- Napoleon Hill
